description: Set up a foreign agent registry for election security
quote: We also call on the government to have the foreign agent registry set up for this election so that Canadians know if any for foreign or hostile regimes are intervening in our our democracy so that we can expose that and protect ourselves.

description: Commitment to legislate the end of all federal barriers to interprovincial trade by July 1st
